enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: OTHER MATTERS -- Impacts of Single Projects
sentences: The COP Secretary said this issue was introduced following a proposal from Iceland.

He noted that decision 14/CP.7 (impacts of single projects) states that industrial process CO2 emissions resulting from a single project that amount to more than 5% of the 1990 base year emissions can be reported separately.
He said the COP-7 decision required any Party wishing to report separately should make a notification before COP-8.
Two notifications, from Iceland and Monaco, had been received and were included in a miscellaneous document.
The COP took note of this information.
